Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Class HarvestGrassAction

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.HarvestGrassAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActionInterface
public class HarvestGrassAction
extends Action
An action which allows users to harvest hay from a Grass Ground type.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public java.lang.String execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      This method checks whether a player is standing on Grass. If a player is, they can choose to harvest the grass producing hay in their inventory, and leaving bare dirt behind on the ground at the current location
      Specified by:
      execute in class Action
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor performing the action.
      map - The map the actor is on.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating that the player has performed the action

    • menuDescription

      public java.lang.String menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      A message indicating if a player would like to harvest the grass they are currently standing on.
      Specified by:
      menuDescription in class Action
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor performing the action.
      Returns:
      A string
